app.name: LoraCode
terminal.dumb_detected: Detected dumb terminal, disabling fancy input and pretty output.
terminal.unicode_error: Terminal does not support pretty output (UnicodeDecodeError)
file.unable_to_write_retries: Unable to write file {filename} after {retries} attempts: {error}
file.encoding_hint: Use --encoding to set the unicode encoding.
history.input_write_error: Unable to write to input history file: {error}
history.llm_write_error: Unable to write to llm history file {filename}: {error}
history.dir_create_error: Could not create directory for input history: {error}
multiline.enabled: Multiline mode: Enabled. Enter inserts newline, Alt-Enter submits text
multiline.disabled: Multiline mode: Disabled. Alt-Enter inserts newline, Enter submits text
llm.empty_response: Empty response received from LLM. Check your provider account?
notification.waiting: Lora Code is waiting for your input
git.unable_to_create: Unable to create git repo in {path}
git.update_name: Update git name with: git config user.name "Your Name"
git.update_email: Update git email with: git config user.email "you@example.com"
git.no_repo_found: No git repo found, create one to track LoraCode's changes (recommended)?
git.home_dir_warning: You should probably run LoraCode in your project's directory, not your home dir.
git.gitignore_skip: You can skip this check with --no-gitignore
git.gitignore_write_error: Error when trying to write to {filename}: {error}
git.gitignore_manual: Try running with appropriate permissions or manually add these patterns to .gitignore:
git.version_error: LoraCode only works with git repos with version number 1 or 2.
git.version_convert: You may be able to convert your repo: git update-index --index-version=2
git.version_no_git: Or run with --no-git to proceed without using git.
git.corrupt_repo: Unable to read git repository, it may be corrupt?
git.no_working_tree: The git repo does not seem to have a working tree?
git.files_different_repos: Files are in different git repos.
git.first_commit: This is the first commit in the repository. Cannot undo.
git.unable_list_files: Unable to list files in git repo: {error}
git.no_changes_display: No changes to display since the last message.
git.unable_get_commit: Unable to get current commit. The repository might be empty.
auth.no_key: No Lora Code API key found.
auth.provide_key: Please provide an API key with --api-key or set LORA_CODE_API_KEY environment variable.
auth.or_login: Or run '/auth login' to authenticate with GitHub Device Flow.
auth.intro: Lora Code provides access to powerful LLM models.
auth.logged_out: Successfully logged out. Credentials have been cleared.
auth.run_login: Run '/auth login' to authenticate with Lora Code.
auth.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
auth.token_expired_reauth: Token has expired. Run '/auth login' to re-authenticate.
auth.fetch_info_failed: Could not fetch fresh user info: {error}
auth.cmd_login: login   - Authenticate with Lora Code using GitHub Device Flow
auth.cmd_status: status  - Show current authentication status and user info
auth.using_model: Using {model} model with Lora Code credentials.
onboarding.no_model: No LLM model was specified and no Lora Code credentials were found.
model.no_available: No models available from Lora Code API.
model.connection_failed: Failed to connect to Lora Code API: {error}
model.deprecated_reasoning: Model setting 'remove_reasoning' is deprecated, please use 'reasoning_tag' instead.
model.did_you_mean: Did you mean one of these?
model.skip_warning: You can skip this check with --no-show-model-warnings
model.unknown_keys: Warning for {model}: Unknown which environment variables are required.
config.yes_line: The file {filename} contains a line starting with 'yes:'
config.yes_replace: Please replace 'yes:' with 'yes-always:' in this file.
config.files_search: Config files search order, if no --config:
analytics.privacy: Lora Code respects your privacy and never collects your code, chat messages, keys or personal info.
analytics.ask: Allow collection of anonymous analytics to help improve Lora Code?
directory.is_directory: {path} is a directory, not provided alone.
directory.provide_hint: Provide either a single directory of a git repo, or a list of one or more files.
directory.relative_warning: Note: in-chat filenames are always relative to the git working dir, not the current working dir.
deprecated.flag_warning: The --{flag} flag is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use --model {model} instead.
chat.summarization_failed: Chat history summarization failed, continuing with full history
chat.mode_should_be: Chat mode should be one of these:
chat.mode_invalid: Chat mode "{mode}" should be one of these:
chat.all_dropped: All files dropped and chat history cleared.
chat.dropping_all: Dropping all files from the chat session.
web.provide_url: Please provide a URL to scrape.
version.rerun: Re-run LoraCode to use new version.
version.check_error: Error checking pypi for new version: {error}
version.too_soon: Too soon to check version: {hours:.1f} hours
version.not_on_pypi: Package not yet published to PyPI, skipping version check.
version.invalid_response: Invalid response from PyPI, skipping version check.
repomap.disabled: Disabling repo map, git repo too large?
repomap.deleted_question: Has it been deleted from the file system but not from git?
repomap.refreshed: The repo map has been refreshed, use /map to view it.
cache.cost_warning: Cost estimates may be inaccurate when using streaming and caching.
imports.error: Error loading required imports. Did you install Lora Code properly?
imports.loaded: Imports loaded and installs file updated
imports.background: Not first run, loading imports in background thread
imports.file_new: Installs file does not exist, creating new dictionary
imports.open_docs: Open documentation url for more info?
search.provide_name: Please provide a partial model name to search for.
clipboard.no_messages: No assistant messages found to copy.
clipboard.copied: Last assistant message copied to clipboard.
clipboard.no_content: No image or text content found in clipboard.
clipboard.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred while copying to clipboard: {error}
ls.no_files: No files in chat, git repo, or read-only list.
ls.repo_files: Repo files not in the chat:
help.usage: Use `/help <question>` to ask questions about how to use Lora Code.
load.provide_file: Please provide a filename containing commands to load.
save.provide_file: Please provide a filename to save the commands to.
reasoning.not_set: Reasoning effort is not currently set.
watch.hint: End your comment with AI! to request changes or AI? to ask questions
command.ask: Ask a question without editing files
command.web: Scrape a webpage and add to chat
cmd.add: Add files to the chat so Lora Code can edit them or review them in detail
cmd.architect: Enter architect/editor mode using 2 different models. If no prompt provided, switches to architect/editor mode.
cmd.ask: Ask questions about the code base without editing any files. If no prompt provided, switches to ask mode.
cmd.auth: Manage Lora Code authentication (login, logout, status)
cmd.chat_mode: Switch to a new chat mode
cmd.code: Ask for changes to your code. If no prompt provided, switches to code mode.
cmd.commit: Commit edits to the repo made outside the chat (commit message optional)
cmd.context: Enter context mode to see surrounding code context. If no prompt provided, switches to context mode.
cmd.copy: Copy the last assistant message to the clipboard
cmd.copy_context: Copy the current chat context as markdown, suitable to paste into a web UI
cmd.diff: Display the diff of changes since the last message
cmd.drop: Remove files from the chat session to free up context space
cmd.edit: Alias for /editor: Open an editor to write a prompt
cmd.editor: Open an editor to write a prompt
cmd.editor_model: Switch the Editor Model to a new LLM
cmd.git: Run a git command (output excluded from chat)
cmd.lint: Lint and fix in-chat files or all dirty files if none in chat
cmd.load: Load and execute commands from a file
cmd.ls: List all known files and indicate which are included in the chat session
cmd.map: Print out the current repository map
cmd.map_refresh: Force a refresh of the repository map
cmd.model: Switch the Main Model to a new LLM
cmd.models: Search the list of available models
cmd.multiline_mode: Toggle multiline mode (swaps behavior of Enter and Meta+Enter)
cmd.paste: Paste image/text from the clipboard into the chat. Optionally provide a name for the image.
cmd.read_only: Add files to the chat that are for reference only, or turn added files to read-only
cmd.reasoning_effort: Set the reasoning effort level (values: number or low/medium/high depending on model)
cmd.report: Report a problem by opening a GitHub Issue
cmd.reset: Drop all files and clear the chat history
cmd.run: Run a shell command and optionally add the output to the chat (alias: !)
cmd.save: Save commands to a file that can reconstruct the current chat session's files
cmd.test: Run a shell command and add the output to the chat on non-zero exit code
cmd.think_tokens: Set the thinking token budget, eg: 8096, 8k, 10.5k, 0.5M, or 0 to disable.
cmd.tokens: Report on the number of tokens used by the current chat context
cmd.undo: Undo the last git commit if it was done by Lora Code
cmd.weak_model: Switch the Weak Model to a new LLM
cmd.web: Scrape a webpage, convert to markdown and send in a message
release.ask_view: Would you like to see what's new in this version?
undo.not_loracode: The last commit was not made by Lora Code in this chat session.
undo.destructive_hint: You could try `/git reset --hard HEAD^` but be aware that this is a destructive command!
undo.multiple_parents: The last commit {hash} has more than 1 parent, can't undo.
undo.uncommitted_changes: The file {filename} has uncommitted changes. Please stash them before undoing.
undo.not_in_previous: The file {filename} was not in the repository in the previous commit. Cannot undo safely.
undo.already_pushed: The last commit has already been pushed to the origin. Undoing is not possible.
tokens.context_usage: Approximate context window usage for {model}, in tokens:
tokens.remaining_warning: {count} tokens remaining in context window (use /drop or /clear to make space)
tokens.exhausted: {count} tokens remaining, window exhausted (use /drop or /clear to make space)
git.add_hint: You can add to git with: /git add {filename}
file.skipping_ignore: Skipping {filename} due to ignore file or --subtree-only.
file.already_editable: {filename} is already in the chat as an editable file
file.cant_add_gitignore: Can't add {filename} which is in gitignore
file.removed_readonly: Removed read-only file {filename} from the chat
file.no_match_wildcard: No match, and cannot create file with wildcard characters: {filename}
file.not_within_root: Can not add {filename}, which is not within {root}
file.moved_to_editable: Moved {filename} from read-only to editable files in the chat
file.not_in_repo: Cannot add {filename} as it's not part of the repository
file.no_vision_support: Cannot add image file {filename} as the {model} does not support images.
file.create_confirm: No files matched '{pattern}'. Do you want to create {filename}?
file.dropping_all: Dropping all files from the chat session.
file.dropping_all_except: Dropping all files from the chat session except originally read-only files.
file.already_readonly: {filename} is already in the chat as a read-only file
file.moved_to_readonly: Moved {filename} from editable to read-only files in the chat
file.added_from_dir: Added {count} files from directory {dirname} to read-only files.
file.no_new_from_dir: No new files added from directory {dirname}.
error.command_interactive_only: Command '{command}' is only supported in interactive mode, skipping.
run.add_output_confirm: Add {tokens}k tokens of command output to the chat?
run.added_output: Added {lines} {line_plural} of output to the chat.
voice.no_api_key: To use /voice you must provide an OpenAI API key.
voice.import_error: Unable to import `sounddevice` and/or `soundfile`, is portaudio installed?
voice.whisper_error: Unable to use OpenAI whisper model: {error}
paste.replaced_image: Replaced existing image in the chat: {filename}
paste.added_image: Added clipboard image to the chat: {filename}
think.not_set: Thinking tokens are not currently set.
think.set: Set thinking token budget to {count} tokens ({formatted}).
history.unable_write_input: Unable to write to input history file: {error}
history.unable_write_llm: Unable to write to llm history file {filename}: {error}
history.unable_write_chat: Warning: Unable to write to chat history file {filename}.
model.unknown_context: Warning for {model}: Unknown context window size and costs, using sane defaults.
model.windows_setx_note: Note: You may need to restart your terminal or command prompt for `setx` to take effect.
model.lora_client_unavailable: Lora Code client not available. Please authenticate first.
main.rate_limit_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded after multiple retries.
main.model_tip: Tip: You can specify a model directly with --model <model_name>
main.streaming_not_supported: Warning: Streaming is not supported by {model}. Disabling streaming.
main.first_run_loading: First run for this version and executable, loading imports synchronously
git.index_error_tree: GitRepo: Index error encountered while reading git tree object. Skipping.
model.client_unavailable: Lora Code client not available. Please authenticate first.
model.usage_hint: Usage: python models.py <model_name> or python models.py --yaml
repomap.cache_fallback: Unable to use tags cache at {path}, falling back to memory cache
repomap.initial_scan: Initial repo scan can be slow in larger repos, but only happens once.
version.newer_available: Newer LoraCode version v{version} is available.
onboarding.using_model: Using {model} model with Lora Code credentials.
onboarding.test_starting: Starting Lora Code authentication flow test...
onboarding.test_finished: Lora Code authentication flow test finished.
